forms_dex.title: Unique Pokémon & Variant Forms
forms_dex.description: This chapter is an extension of the Pokédex, providing detailed entries for Pokémon with unique forms. These entries should be used in place of the standard Pokédex entry when encountering these specific Pokémon.

alola.name: Alolan Sandshrew
alola.evolution: Evolves into Alolan Sandslash with an Ice Stone.

alola.name: Alolan Vulpix
alola.evolution: Evolves into Alolan Ninetales with an Ice Stone.

alola.name: Alolan Graveler
alola.evolution: Evolves into Alolan Golem via trade.

galar.name: Galarian Slowpoke
galar.evolution: Evolves into Galarian Slowbro or Galarian Slowking.

galar.name: Galarian Farfetch'd
galar.evolution: Evolves into Sirfetch'd after landing 3 critical hits in one battle.

galar.name: Galarian Darumaka
galar.evolution: Evolves into Galarian Darmanitan with an Ice Stone.

galar.name: Galarian Darmanitan
galar.evolution: Final Stage. Zen Mode changes its type to Ice/Fire and alters its stats.

galar.name: Galarian Yamask
galar.evolution: Evolves into Runerigus after taking significant damage and passing under a specific stone arch.

hisui.name: Hisuian Growlithe
hisui.evolution: Evolves into Hisuian Arcanine with a Fire Stone.

hisui.name: Hisuian Voltorb
hisui.evolution: Evolves into Hisuian Electrode with a Leaf Stone.

hisui.name: Hisuian Sliggoo
hisui.evolution: Evolves into Hisuian Goodra in the rain.

other_forms.title: Strategic Forme Changes
other_forms.description: Pokémon that can actively shift between different formes, often resulting in changes to their Type, Attributes, and Abilities.

forms.description: Its body is optimized for offense, but it is extremely frail.
Its body is optimized for defense, but its offensive capabilities are low.
Its body is streamlined for speed, sacrificing some power and bulk.
It can travel through dimensions. It is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours.
When it blooms, it can fly. It is said to deliver feelings of gratitude.

forms.notes: Changes with the move Sunny Day.
Changes with the move Rain Dance.

forms.description: It can sing melodies that can control the emotions of those who hear it.
In this form, it uses its sharp edges to attack. Its defenses are lowered.
When it is hungry, its fur changes color and it becomes more aggressive. Its Aura Wheel becomes a Dark-type move.
When its ice block is broken, it becomes faster but more vulnerable.

the_forces_of_nature.description: Tornadus, Thundurus, Landorus, and Enamorus can change to their Therian Formes using the Reveal Glass.

gender_forms.title: Gender-Based Forms
gender_forms.description: Pokémon that exhibit significant differences between males and females.
